text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco 1. Eminent Past Presidents and respectful citizens attend John Lewis tribute.
2. Stock market swoon on jobless report.
3.  Herman Cain dies after acquessing to your absurd position on Covid-19 public health precautions.

#CadetBoneSpurs missing in action.  Have another slice.!
